title: Conti?s Hacker Manuals ? Read, Reviewed & Analyzed
description: Conti is a notorious ransomware group that targets high-revenue organizations. They were first detected in 2020, and appear to be based in Russia. It is believed that the group is the successor to Ryuk ransomware group. According to Chainalysis, The ransomware group was the highest grossing of all ransomware groups in 2021, with an estimated revenue of at least 180 million dollars.
author: Akamai Security Research
